verses.roman:
dui jane premāveśe karena krandana
premānande śithila haila duṅhākāra mana

synonyms: dui jane—both of them; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; karena—do; krandana—crying; prema-ānande—in ecstatic love; śithila haila—became slackened; duṅhākāra—of both of them; mana—minds.
translation: In great ecstatic love they both began to cry, and thus their minds were slackened.
